class Solution:
    def shortestDistanceAfterQueries(self, n: int, queries: List[List[int]]) -> List[int]:
        l = defaultdict(int)
        r = defaultdict(int)
        for i in range(n):
            l[i] = i - 1
            r[i] = i + 1
        tot = n
        ans = []
        def delete(node):
            r[l[node]] = r[node]
            l[r[node]] = l[node]
        vis = set()
        for u, v in queries:
            if u not in vis and v not in vis:
                cur = r[u]
                while cur != v:
                    tmp = cur
                    cur = r[cur]
                    vis.add(tmp)
                    delete(tmp)
                    tot -= 1
            ans.append(tot - 1)
        return ans
